thread.title: Andi Dorfman Confronts Bachelor Nick Viall About His Infamous Sex Question in New Sneak Peek
thread.title_full: Andi Dorfman Confronts Bachelor Nick Viall About His Infamous Sex Question in New Sneak Peek

title: Andi Dorfman Confronts Bachelor Nick Viall About His Infamous Sex Question in New Sneak Peek
text:
Andi Dorfman Confronts Bachelor Nick Viall About His Infamous Sex Question in New Sneak Peek February 24, 2017 @ 4:01 PM By Us Weekly Staff 
That infamous question just won't go away. Nick Viall gets a surprise visit from ex Andi Dorfman on The Bachelor' s Monday, February 27, episode, and she doesn't wait long before delving into their thorny past, as seen in a new sneak peek. The Bachelorette: What Happened to These Suitors After the Final Rose? The ABC dating series' preview clip shows the Bachelor, 36, hashing things out with Dorfman, 29, who broke his heart when she gave her final rose to Josh Murray on the Bachelorette season 10 finale that aired in 2014. Viall stunned viewers during the subsequent "After the Final Rose" special when he asked Dorfman, "If you weren't in love with me, I'm just not sure why you made love with me." These ‘Bachelor’ and ‘Bachelorette’ Babies Will Melt Your Heart Andi and Nick on 'After The Final Rose' Todd Wawrychuk/ABC via Getty Images In the clip from Monday's episode, Viall tells the camera that Dorfman's visit is bringing back memories of her stopping by his hotel room in the Dominican Republic during her finale to end things with him before he could even pick out a ring for her. "The last time Andi knocked on my hotel door, she actually broke up with me," the two-time Bachelorette runner-up says. "So what the f--k is she doing here now?" 10 Times 'The Bachelor' Made Our Heads Explode! 
Dorfman explains to him, "I really just want to see where you're at — what you're thinking, how's it going." Viall replies, "It's been good. I just can relate to you a little bit more now. … You know, it's great, but it's tough." You May Also Like
